titleStmt.title: A looking-glasse of hvmane frailty set before us in a sermon preached at the funerals of Mris. Anne Calquit, late wife of Mr. Nicholas Calquit, draper, who died on the 7. day of April 1659 and was interr'd the 19. of the said month, at the parish church of Alhallows the Less in Thames Street / by Nath. Hardy ...
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. for Joseph Cranford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
